title: Average test score in mathematics and science
subtitle:
Shown are Hanushek and Woessmann's combination of scores from international student achievement tests. 
The scores are standardized to the PISA test scale, so that the OECD countries have a mean of 500 and a standard deviation of 100. 
The test scores are not given for a particular year, but instead are the average of all standardized math and science test scores each country participated in.
